name: Enduring Dreamers: Freya
description:
…even the greatest of adventures have but a small beginnings.

ARCADE

Endless Platform
Think, plan, jump, all while a cold harsh storm forces you forward.

Some of the obstacles you will be facing are:
  • Spikes
  • Poisonous flowers
  • Rotating platforms
  • Vertical/horizontal platforms
  • Falling platforms


  • Crushing pillars
  • Flying penguins


  • Breakable ice


  • …with many more obstacles to come!

Can you perform this trick?

THINGS TO LOOK FORWARD TO

  • Move/re-make the game on a new updated engine.
  • Add additional fun arcade modes.
  • Implement multiplayer for players to play with friends.

Thanks for reading, Freya out!
